articles.author: Benjamin Njiri
articles.title: CoinStats shuts down: Phishing attack affects 1590 wallets worth $2M - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: CoinStats' affected wallets were drained of $2 million. Will users be repaid?
articles.content:
• CoinStats shuts down after suffering a security breach. 
  • Reportedly,  $2 million of funds were drained per CoinStats CEO. 
CoinStats, a crypto portfolio management and tracki… [+1514 chars]
